combatMove.name: Rend
combatMove.description: Use [npc.her] raptor-like toes to deliver a merciless slice to [npc.her] target, dealing formattedDamageInflicted damage.
combatMove.availabilityDescription: Available to characters who have 'raptor' legs.
combatMove.movePredictionDescriptionWithTarget: Use [npc.her] raptor claws to deliver a lethal slice to [npc2.name], dealing formattedDamageInflicted damage. #IF(npc.isLegMovementHindered()) [style.italicsMinorBad(Damage is reduced by 50% as [npc.her] clothing is hindering leg movement!)] #ENDIF
combatMove.movePredictionDescriptionNoTarget: Use [npc.her] raptor claws to deliver a lethal slice to [npc.her] target, dealing formattedDamageInflicted damage. #IF(npc.isLegMovementHindered()) [style.italicsMinorBad(Damage is reduced by 50% as [npc.her] clothing is hindering leg movement!)] #ENDIF

performMove.execute: #IF(npc.isLegMovementHindered()) As [npc.her] clothing is restricting [npc.her] legs' movement, [npc.name] [npc.verb(struggle)] to put any power behind [npc.her] strike, and as a result only [npc.verb(deal)] half damage to [npc2.name]... #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lunge)] forth, before kicking out with [npc.her] claws extended and delivering a slice [npc2.name] with [npc.her] [npc.feet]! #ENDIF formattedHealthDamage
